mistral:7b-instruct: The EPO plan from Queensland Country Health with a monthly premium of $300 offers comprehensive coverage for your health conditions, including hospitalization, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care. With a coverage limit of $500,000, this plan provides significant financial protection in case of expensive medical treatments due to your multiple conditions such as hypertension, diabetes, heart disease, stroke, and right-sided weakness. The maximum out-of-pocket expense (Max OOP) of $6,500 helps limit your potential healthcare costs. Given your high income bracket and risk level, this plan offers a balance between coverage and affordability that aligns well with your needs. Noteworthy exclusions include cosmetic procedures and experimental treatments, ensuring you are only covered for medically necessary care.
